Only reason that it helped me is because I wanted to ask the part where it says “::” if I changed that to a “/” like on WoW, would my commands be executed e.g. /pickup like that?

Yes, they would.
But you’d have to change some substrings around, I recall.

item.title: Creating a Command Client side
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

Oke, so this comes inhandy If your making a cheat client or you just want some commands client side.
I will go through some shit in this topic and what is there for you.

Okey, were to add the command…

Search for:

if(aString887.startsWith("::"))

You should see:

if(aString887.startsWith("::")) { aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method397((byte)6, 103); aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method398(aString887.length() - 1); aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method405(aString887.substring(2)); } else { String s = aString887.toLowerCase();

If you’ve not got String s = aString887.toLowerCase(); after the last { add it.

Doing your command…

Oke, so add this:

if(s.startsWith("::commandname")) //Command name. { //Your st00f goes here. }

I attached two of my files for you to use in your commands.

Name - What it does - Usage:
Launcher - Launches a program. - Launcher.Launch(“PATH OF THE PROGRAM”);
URLLauncher - Launches a URL. - URLLauncher.URL(“WEBSITE URL”);

Enjoy.

Read full topic
